backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing blink rates, vibration events, user profiles, and access control with data filtering and event summaries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a clean rebuild/deploy feature with related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including hooks, components, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with routes for dashboard, device connection, ingestion, and smoke test inside a BluetoothProvider.
frontend/src/components/actor/ActorBoots: Deprecated wrapper component that no longer initializes actors and simply renders children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login landing page using Internet Identity with marketing content and a CTA to authenticate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity state and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkRate: Canvas-based line chart rendering blink rate history with loading/empty states and simple scaling logic.
frontend/src/components/charts/BlinkSumm: Empty placeholder file for a blink summary history chart.
frontend/src/components/charts/Vibration: Truncated file; expected to display vibration event data but contains no content here.
frontend/src/components/device/DeviceSel: Renders a card for entering and validating a device ID with a link to manage devices.
frontend/src/components/docs/ApiExamples: Displays API usage examples with tabs and copy-to-clipboard buttons for JS and cURL snippets.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Provides the app’s top navigation bar with links to main sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the overall page layout with header, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Deprecated dialog for entering a user name; remains as a non-rendered compatibility component.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/S: Shows current alertness state and allows generating a personalized sleep schedule based on blink data.
frontend/src/components/time/TimeRangePi: Card UI for selecting a time range and utility to compute start/end timestamps.
frontend/src/contexts/BluetoothContext.t: Manages BLE connection lifecycle, notifications, and blink detection from sensor data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor for backend calls, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrap.ts: Deprecated hook that formerly initialized actors; now a no-op.
frontend/src/hooks/useBleWriteQueue.ts: Deprecated hook returning a no-op BLE write queue.
Deprecated hook for backend blink summary flushing; now returns static values.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s user profile via the actor once initialized.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceId.ts: Manages a device ID with localStorage persistence and exposes validity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useEyeRBluetooth.ts: Handles Web Bluetooth connections, notifications, and blink‑rate parsing for EyeR devices.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context using Dfinity AuthClient with login, logout, and state management.
Maintains blink‑rate history in localStorage with capped size and helper actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor queries and mutations for blink data, vibration events, and user profiles using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useRollingBlinkRateAv: Tracks blink rates and computes a rolling 5‑minute average with pruning and state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionBlinkRateHi: Stores an in‑memory session‑only blink‑rate history limited to recent entries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a light/dark UI color palette with CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard UI showing live blink data, rolling averages, device selection, history, and personalized sleep schedule generation.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceConnection.tsx: UI for managing Bluetooth connection to ESP32-C3, handling connect/disconnect, blink rate updates, and status display.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceDataIngestion.t: Documentation page describing how devices submit telemetry data, including required fields and API behavior.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeTest.tsx: Frontend page that runs basic backend connectivity tests using Internet Identity and an actor instance.
frontend/src/types/bluetooth.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Web Bluetooth GATT APIs, defining devices, services, characteristics, and related types.
frontend/src/utils/bleNus.ts: Utilities for parsing blink rate data from Nordic UART Service and legacy heart-rate–style BLE notifications.
frontend/src/utils/bleUuid.ts: Helpers for normalizing and formatting BLE UUIDs into Web Bluetooth–compatible forms.
frontend/src/utils/bleWriteQueue.ts: LocalStorage-backed queue for storing unsent blink rate records with enqueue, fetch, remove, and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/localSleepSchedule.ts: Analyzes recent blink‑rate data to compute average BPM and generates sleep or alertness recommendations based on thresholds and variability.
frontend/src/utils/personalizedSleepSche: Maps rolling average BPM to an alertness state and returns predefined work/rest schedules tailored to that state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash‑based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Captures project state and issues, noting a stuck deployment and requirements for forced rebuild and detailed error reporting.
